name: Spacescape II
description:
Teaser

Video Gameplay

Deskripsi

One day, Some researcher from Nova Space Research (NSR) doing a research for a planet called Nova that expected to be the next living place for human being, this team lead by professor Joseano and they are using BT-01 space ship with a full equipment for the research and a weapon that can shoot a laser, after they doing some research and they get the information they need from that planet, they decided to go back to planet Earth.

But suddenly, they saw a big explotion from far away, they predicted that the explotion came from an another galaxy but professor Joseano cant take any chances and they decided to take all the information and samples from that planet and the crew back to BT-01 and go back to planet Earth as fast as possible, but when they are on their way they saw a lot of meteorite flying randomly across them because of the explotion of that other galaxy.

They have to go through that meteorite so that they can go home safely, knowing that, professor Joseano take the “wheel” because he is the leader of this team and he wont lose any information about the planet and his crew, luckily they have a weapon that can shoot a laser so that they can destroy the meteorite  that comes in their way

Made with ❤ by Slathem Studio.
